newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT- Federal Express rating up.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- Federal Express rating up.

text.p: -- Gruntal & Co said Tuesday it raised its rating of Federal Express Corp to neutral from outperform with a two-year target price of $55 a share.

-- Analyst Steve Lewins said the upgrade stems from growing discontent among domestic and global shippers, who are receiving poor service from other freight forwarders and airlines, but reliable service from both Federal Express and United Parcel Service Inc.
-- The upgrade is concept driven and long term, said Lewins.
-- Federal Express stock was up 3/8 at 44-5/8.
